summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Proposal Builder app after CORS fix. Backend APIs are fully functional (12/12 tests passed). Dashboard and most frontend features now work correctly, but Create Proposal page has critical React runtime error preventing new proposal creation.

ui_bugs.issue: React runtime error: 'Maximum update depth exceeded' causing infinite loop
Checkbox selection has overlay interception issues, difficult to click

integration_issues.issue: Generate Proposal button becomes unclickable due to React error

passed_tests: Backend stats endpoint with correct data (2 proposals)
Dashboard loading and data display (CORS fixed)
Dashboard stats cards showing correct values
Dashboard filter tabs (All, Draft, Pending Review, Sent, Accepted, Rejected)
Proposal detail page loading and display
Navigation between Dashboard, Clause Library, and Proposal Detail
Frontend-Backend API integration (resolved from previous iteration)

success_percentage.frontend: 80% (Most features work, Create Proposal flow broken)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix React runtime error on Create Proposal page. The error 'Maximum update depth exceeded' indicates an infinite loop in a React component, likely in ClauseSelector. This prevents users from creating new proposals. Also fix checkbox overlay interception issues in clause selection.
